ovdesc.p: This table defines the category codes and transaction codes for account and P&L postings for ICA interest.
It is keyed on company code, and normally there will be only 1 record for the master company which can be used for all ICA postings.
When the record is first input the existing IC transaction codes and p&L categories are loaded, which can then be subsequently changed for reporting purposes.

desc.p: Identifies the transaction code to be assigned to Profit and Loss (Debit2) entries generated as a result of passing adjustment entries of ICA.
4 or 5 numeric character Category code. (Mandatory input)
It must be a valid code on the CATEGORY table (Ref: General Tables).
System Indicator in Category record must be PL.
Identifies the transaction code to be assigned to customer account (Credit2) entries generated as a result of passing adjustment entries of ICA.
Must be a valid transaction code
4 or 5 numeric character Category code. (Mandatory input)
It must be a valid code on the CATEGORY table (Ref: General Tables).
System Indicator in Category record must be PL.
Identifies the Category code to be assigned to Profit and Loss (Debit) entries generated as a result of setting up of ICA.
4 or 5 numeric character Category code. (Mandatory input)
It must be a valid code on the CATEGORY table (Ref: General Tables).
System Indicator in Category record must be PL.
Specifies the transaction code to be used for the debit entries to Customer Account, when any adjustment entry for Interest Compensation (that is already posted) is generated.
1-10(Max Value) numeric characters TRANSACTION Code. (Mandatory Input)
The Maximum value is specified in EB.OBJECT for TRANSACTION.
Must be a valid transaction code on the TRANSACTION table.
Specifies the transaction code to be used for the debit entries to Profit & Loss Category mentioned above, when the entry for Interest Compensation is generated.
1-10(Max Value) numeric characters TRANSACTION Code. (Mandatory Input)
The Maximum value is specified in EB.OBJECT for TRANSACTION.
Must be a valid transaction code on the TRANSACTION table.
Specifies the transaction code to be used for the Debit2 entries to Profit & Loss Category mentioned above, when the entry for Interest Compensation is generated.
1-10(Max Value) numeric characters TRANSACTION Code. (Mandatory Input)
The Maximum value is specified in EB.OBJECT for TRANSACTION.
Must be a valid transaction code on the TRANSACTION table.

Specifies the transaction code to be used for the credit entries to Profit & Loss Category mentioned above, when the entry for Interest Compensation is generated.
1-10(Max Value) numeric characters TRANSACTION Code. (Mandatory Input)
The Maximum value is specified in EB.OBJECT for TRANSACTION.
Must be a valid transaction code on the TRANSACTION table.
The key to this table, must be an existing company code
